snippet: John Maine, whose Mets career ended with shoulder surgery three years ago, insists he was upfront about his health to team officials.
abstract: John Maine, whose Mets career ended with shoulder surgery three years ago, insists he was upfront about his health to team officials.

headline.main: Back in Majors, Pitcher Maine Denies Lying to Mets in 2010
headline.print_headline: Back in Majors, Maine Denies Lying to Mets
